meaningMnemonic: Something you <kanji>make</kanji> that oozes with <kanji>greatness</kanji> is your <vocabulary>masterpiece</vocabulary>. The very <vocabulary>best work</vocabulary> you'll ever make in your entire life.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
